archimate:ApplicationFunction.name: (L2) Create ILS BOM from eBOM
archimate:ApplicationFunction.documentation: Data preparation in MOA Environment is done by copying data from DOA Environment (this copy/paste is run in the same tool: CorePDM). This duplication of data between DOA and MOA environment may also consists in splitting reference: one P/N from DOA is split into several P/N in MOA (LSA BOM). All the split is done in CorePDM. Maintenance Operations are then linked to the right LSA P/N into CorePDM.
